title: More Than Just BALLS
body_text:
It's the year's grandest spectacle and it happens just this once.
Welcome to the unprecedented
150th
EastCoastDodgeball
Presentation
.
An astonishing 35 months - a good 1,000 full 24-hour days - have whizzed on by. And in a three-year time period, look what's happened; friendships formed, tears poured, laughs shared, tempers flared, fingers broken, blood shed, and memories created. Phew, that covers a hell of a lot of ground and all from a popular playground game.
But plenty more has been thrown than just the beerbelly-shaped painballs and wicked-fast bulletballs. "What else," you ask? Let's take a ride back in time shall we ..
Can I Take Your Order?
The "tasty" consequences of the dreaded
CREAMation
encounters aren't as sweet for the defeated, incomparable powerhouse
Kevin Fitzpatrick
, legendary female titan
Lauren Winston
, and upcoming leading general
Bobby Vetrano
just to name a few. Flip the menu over and see a delicious selection of poisonous pastries, baked by "Muffin Man"
Juan Londono
.
What Rulebook?
Why catching phenom
Mike "Sputz" Krott
and first lady of dodgeball
Diana DiBuccio
haven't been given referee shirts still boggles minds. These enthusiastic, diehard dodgeballers threw the rulebook out the window long before it was even published. You gotta love 'em anyway.
Temper Tantrums
Poor innocent balloons popped, stationary trash cans kicked to the curb, neon team regenerators-turned-javelins; geez
Letsche
, get help. And supposedly no one informed
Justin "Punter" Wolf"
about the field goal kicker position - it's been filled.
The Fire Burns!
There are those who stand calmly, patiently along the backline, waiting to capture an unsuspecting prey. And then there are those who simply don't give a damn.
Joey "Eddie Gordo" Smalls
, break-dancing dodger
Sascha Basista
, Wrestle'Maniac'
Travis Mills
and the original kamikaze
Steve Adams
never hesitate in hurling themselves into enemy fire.
Let Them Eat Cake!
Plan your birthday with
EastCoastDodgeball
! Contact DODGEBALL 150 main eventer
Lauren Stopa
for all the details!
The Invisible Crown.
And since DAY 1, the once long-haired, WWE shirt wearin', self-proclaimed "Creation"
John Tronolone
, apparently with the The Writer's blessing, has perhaps thrown more of his "weight" around than anyone else. Who presented him with the key to the kingdom?
Over 400 competitors, some 1200 completed games, and this is what awaits.
The
reward
..
The MAIN EVENT:
Men vs. Women!
A colossal, never-before-witnessed three-on-three war dividing the genders in half! The testosterone-filled alliance of
BOBBY VETRANO
,
TRAVIS MILLS
, and
JUAN LONDONO
epically collide with the female faction comprised of
ALISON BERTSCH
,
LAUREN STOPA
, and
DIANA DIBUCCIO
. There is no greater battle in 2008 than the one that awaits at DODGEBALL 150. Be there.
Show Me The $$$!
The winner-take-all competition returns to the prestigious ten event spotlight! The ever-popular "MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest crown is up for grabs at DODGEBALL 150. Who will walk away with bragging rights a mile wide
and
some dough? Find out live August 9. Don't forget about the $1 entry fee!
"Want More."
A most fitting tagline to such an extraordinary night. Eye-blinding decorations, delicious sideline delights, and the Spengeman-Tronolone co-produced DODGEBALL 150 Soundtrack are just three plus reasons to attend this milestone. Family, friends, coworkers, pets .. we want you there as well!
Throwin' Our Own Party!
The superstars invite you to the official afterparty of DODGEBALL 150 at the one and only Applebee's in Wall. The night just wouldn't feel complete without this tradition.
EastCoastDodgeball
warriors.
Beloved relatives and close personal friends.
Let all of us celebrate this moment together.
After all, it's how we got here.
Kid Rock "Bawitdaba"
Official Theme Song of DODGEBALL 150!
body_html:
It's the year's grandest spectacle and it happens just this once.
Welcome to the unprecedented 150th EastCoastDodgeball Presentation.

An astonishing 35 months - a good 1,000 full 24-hour days - have whizzed on by. And in a three-year time period, look what's happened; friendships formed, tears poured, laughs shared, tempers flared, fingers broken, blood shed, and memories created. Phew, that covers a hell of a lot of ground and all from a popular playground game.

But plenty more has been thrown than just the beerbelly-shaped painballs and wicked-fast bulletballs. "What else," you ask? Let's take a ride back in time shall we ..

  • Can I Take Your Order?
    The "tasty" consequences of the dreaded CREAMation encounters aren't as sweet for the defeated, incomparable powerhouse Kevin Fitzpatrick, legendary female titan Lauren Winston, and upcoming leading general Bobby Vetrano just to name a few. Flip the menu over and see a delicious selection of poisonous pastries, baked by "Muffin Man" Juan Londono.
  • What Rulebook?
    Why catching phenom Mike "Sputz" Krott and first lady of dodgeball Diana DiBuccio haven't been given referee shirts still boggles minds. These enthusiastic, diehard dodgeballers threw the rulebook out the window long before it was even published. You gotta love 'em anyway.
  • Temper Tantrums
    Poor innocent balloons popped, stationary trash cans kicked to the curb, neon team regenerators-turned-javelins; geez Letsche, get help. And supposedly no one informed Justin "Punter" Wolf" about the field goal kicker position - it's been filled.
  • The Fire Burns!
    There are those who stand calmly, patiently along the backline, waiting to capture an unsuspecting prey. And then there are those who simply don't give a damn. Joey "Eddie Gordo" Smalls, break-dancing dodger Sascha Basista, Wrestle'Maniac' Travis Mills and the original kamikaze Steve Adams never hesitate in hurling themselves into enemy fire.
  • Let Them Eat Cake!
    Plan your birthday with EastCoastDodgeball! Contact DODGEBALL 150 main eventer Lauren Stopa for all the details!
  • The Invisible Crown.
    And since DAY 1, the once long-haired, WWE shirt wearin', self-proclaimed "Creation" John Tronolone, apparently with the The Writer's blessing, has perhaps thrown more of his "weight" around than anyone else. Who presented him with the key to the kingdom?
Over 400 competitors, some 1200 completed games, and this is what awaits.
The reward ..


The MAIN EVENT: Men vs. Women!
A colossal, never-before-witnessed three-on-three war dividing the genders in half! The testosterone-filled alliance of BOBBY VETRANO, TRAVIS MILLS, and JUAN LONDONO epically collide with the female faction comprised of ALISON BERTSCH, LAUREN STOPA, and DIANA DIBUCCIO. There is no greater battle in 2008 than the one that awaits at DODGEBALL 150. Be there.

Show Me The $$$!
The winner-take-all competition returns to the prestigious ten event spotlight! The ever-popular "MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest crown is up for grabs at DODGEBALL 150. Who will walk away with bragging rights a mile wide and some dough? Find out live August 9. Don't forget about the $1 entry fee!

"Want More."
A most fitting tagline to such an extraordinary night. Eye-blinding decorations, delicious sideline delights, and the Spengeman-Tronolone co-produced DODGEBALL 150 Soundtrack are just three plus reasons to attend this milestone. Family, friends, coworkers, pets .. we want you there as well!

Throwin' Our Own Party!
The superstars invite you to the official afterparty of DODGEBALL 150 at the one and only Applebee's in Wall. The night just wouldn't feel complete without this tradition.

EastCoastDodgeball warriors.
Beloved relatives and close personal friends.
Let all of us celebrate this moment together.
After all, it's how we got here.


Kid Rock "Bawitdaba"
Official Theme Song of DODGEBALL 150!
